description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Troyes vs Red Star in the Ligue 2
title: Troyes vs Red Star: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head
title_page: Troyes vs Red Star: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Full Time
Second Half ends, Troyes 2, Red Star 2.
Post
Fourth official has announced 2 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt saved. Kémo Cissé (Red Star) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Merwan Ifnaoui.
Post
Attempt blocked. Abdoulaye Kanté (Troyes) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Mounaïm El Idrissy.
Post
Attempt missed. Hianga'a Mbock (Red Star) header from the centre of the box misses to the right following a set piece situation.
Post
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution
Substitution, Troyes. Mathys Detourbet replaces Cyriaque Irié because of an injury.
Post
Delay in match because of an injury Cyriaque Irié (Troyes).
Post
Adrien Monfray (Troyes) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Booking
Adrien Monfray (Troyes) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
